env: PHPIZE_DEPS=autoconf 		dpkg-dev 		file 		g++ 		gcc 		libc-dev 		make 		pkg-config 		re2c

description.llb.customname: load composer files from build context

env: PHPIZE_DEPS=autoconf 		dpkg-dev 		file 		g++ 		gcc 		libc-dev 		make 		pkg-config 		re2c

args: docker-php-ext-install -j"$(nproc)" intl opcache pdo_mysql soap sockets zip; docker-php-source delete; curl -f -o /usr/local/sbin/notpecl https://storage.googleapis.com/notpecl/notpecl; chmod +x /usr/local/sbin/notpecl; notpecl install --download-dir=/var/cache/notpecl --cleanup=false apcu:5.1.18; docker-php-ext-enable apcu; rm -rf /usr/local/sbin/notpecl
env: PHPIZE_DEPS=autoconf 		dpkg-dev 		file 		g++ 		gcc 		libc-dev 		make 		pkg-config 		re2c

description.llb.customname: Install PHP extensions (apcu, intl, opcache, pdo_mysql, soap, sockets, zip)
load config files from build context

args: apt-get update; apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends git=1:2.20.1-2+deb10u1 libicu-dev=63.1-6+deb10u1 libjpeg-dev=1:1.5.2-2 libssl-dev=1.1.1d-0+deb10u2 libxml2-dev=2.9.4+dfsg1-7+b3 libzip-dev=1.5.1-4 openssl=1.1.1d-0+deb10u2 unzip=6.0-23+deb10u1 zlib1g-dev=1:1.2.11.dfsg-1; apt-get autoclean
env: PHPIZE_DEPS=autoconf 		dpkg-dev 		file 		g++ 		gcc 		libc-dev 		make 		pkg-config 		re2c
